Feature.Name: terminal
Feature.LookText: The data terminal is flashing at the log-on screen. Looks functional.

XTriggerString.Trigger: print(Good morning! It is 08:30 AM, 3rd of April, 3,000,2108 AD);print(It has been 3 million years, 4 hours and 23 minutes since your last log-in.);print(You have 53,232,996 unread email messages)
